title: Heyboss | Marketplace
description: Commercial web-site with responsive design to advertise marketplace of auto parts consists of few pages with basic description of the project and forms to collect the feedback from potential clients

title: Tweet application
description: Tweet application displays users' cards with possibility to follow/unfollow users and allows to set filter by 'all users', 'followed users' and 'unfollowed users' with 'Load more' button

title: Goose-track
description: Fullstack application available for registered users which allows to add/change personal data, maintain tasks in calendar. Login credentials: Email: test2024@mail.com, Password: Test2024

title: Flowers
description: One-page web-site for Flowers store with adaptive design, burger menu, subscribe and contact forms. The web-site has been created with Parcel, has basic animation and styled using preprocessor SCSS

title: Ice-cream
description: Wed-site for ice-cream company whith adaptive design, reviews slider, map and order form. The web-site has been created with Parcel, has basic animation and styled using preprocessor SCSS

title: WebStudio
description: Web-site for web-studio consists of two pages with navigation and burger menu. The web-site has been created with HTML, has adaptive design, order and subscription forms

title: Movies project
description: Web-site for movies reflects trending movies via API and allows movies search by name and get main information. Movie page also contains cast and reviews for the film

title: Ecosolution
description: Web-site for Energy Company with adaptive design, burger menu on all devices, fixed header, automatic counter, slider, accordion and a contact form with fields validation
